components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to MTN Network in Uganda

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to MTN network in Uganda. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Orange Network in Burkina Faso

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays to Orange network in Burkina Faso. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Port Away Notifications Not Being Sent to User

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing an issue with port away notifications not being sent to customers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing an issue with port away notifications not being sent to customers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing issue with Port Away Notifications not Being Sent to Users. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing issue with Port Away Notifications not Being Sent to Users. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing issue with Port Away Notifications not Being Sent to Users. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are experiencing issue with Port Away Notifications not Being Sent to Users. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Port Away Notifications. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 January 2023 at 19:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US and Canadian handsets via subset of Longcodes and Shortcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - U Mobile

incident_updates.body: The U Mobile network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2023 at 10:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from U Mobile Malaysia handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 15 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance in Denmark

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Denmark is conducting an emergency maintenance from 15 January 2023 at 16:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of handset in Denmark.

Our SMS carrier partner in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 08:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Malaysia handsets via a subset of Shortcodes.

The Airtel network in Africa is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 10:30 PST until 16 January 2023 at 16:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Airtel Africa handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - All Airtel Networks

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 10:30 PST until 16 January 2023 at 16:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to the below Airtel networks:
Nigeria
Uganda
Congo Democratic Republic
Tanzania
Niger
Zambia
Sri Lanka
Gabon
Malawi
Congo
Kenya
Chad
Rwanda
Madagascar
India

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Switzerland is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 18:00 PST. incident_updates.body:
Our Carrier Partner EE UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 19 January 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK customers.
Impacted Products: SNA, Lookup SIM Swap and Identity Match

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 09 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
11 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 11 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
